snippet.title: Luigi's Spookful Quest - NSMBFMD 2023 Trailer
snippet.description:
This mod was featured in the New Super Mario Bros. Franchise Modding Direct (2023). Please check out the original presentation here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40OUE8quoz4&ab_channel=Rimea

Luigi's Spookful Quest (or LSQ for short) is a 1-world New Super Mario Bros. 2 mod featuring primarily ghostly themed levels, with some of said levels mixing some of the common Mario themes but has a more ghostly vibe. But this time, Luigi has to save the day after Mario has been kidnapped by Roy Koopa. Can Luigi save his brother (again)?

Features:
- Luigi as player 1! (duh)
- Custom backgrounds, models, etc.
- 8 spooky levels, with 24 Power Moons scattered across the levels to collect
- Custom tilesets
- A spooky soundtrack, with songs from other Nintendo games

Credits to @B1_Gaming for making the logo!
For updates, be sure to join the Discord: https://discord.gg/yQ4AhGWsb5

Other Socials:
2nd extras channel: https://www.youtube.com/@techmuseExtras
Twitter - https://twitter.com/techmuse8
Twitch - https://twitch.tv/techmuse
GitHub - https://github.com/techmuse8
Website - https://techmuse8.github.io/
